entry.source: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200002}I'm sorry that you eluded me so long.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200002}I'm sorry that you eluded me so long.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200003}The most unfortunate thing about{F801}humans is the fact of their birth...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200004}That's why I shall lead you to a{F801}paradise...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200003}The most unfortunate thing about{F801}humans is the fact of their birth...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200004}That's why I shall lead you to a{F801}paradise...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200005}Where the shackles of God do not{F801}exist...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200006}The afterlife.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ixtab\0{F87A,-305}{F813,0,200005}Where the shackles of God do not{F801}exist...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200006}The afterlife.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,200008}To preach that death is salvation,{F801}preying upon people's weakness...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200009}{F87B,3,2,1,1}Vile behavior, even for a demon.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,200008}To preach that death is salvation,{F801}preying upon people's weakness...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200009}{F87B,3,2,1,1}Vile behavior, even for a demon.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,200010}A rather unwelcome "favor," isn't it?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200011}{F87B,4,3,1,1}It's up to each man to decide for{F801}himself what "paradise" entails.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,200010}A rather unwelcome "favor," isn't it?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,200011}{F87B,4,3,1,1}It's up to each man to decide for{F801}himself what "paradise" entails.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The atmosphere in the area is changing...{F801}
